sentences.en: At that moment, from behind the short bush, there appear the artillery ensign.
sentences.cn: 此时从矮小的丛林后面出现了炮兵部队的军旗.

sentences.en: At the end of the war Herry was mustered out as an ensign.
sentences.cn: 亨利在战争结束退伍时,是个海军少尉.

sentences.en: Ay, tear her tattered ensign down!
Desolate Pluto is inserted full ensign.
sentences.cn: 荒凉的冥王星插满了国旗.

sentences.en: Ensign was a retriever, and retrieved everything that wasn't nailed down.
sentences.cn: “恩塞恩”是一种能寻回猎物的猎犬,无论什么东西,只要不是用钉子钉牢,它都能找回来.

sentences.en: Ensign: Picking up something on the long - range scanner . Unidentified vessel . Looks like a cruiser.
sentences.cn: 长程扫描发现目标,是无法确认的飞行物,疑似巡航舰.

sentences.en: Hasi : His Chinese name is Baoyu, He is from Naiman ensign.
sentences.cn: 哈斯: 汉文名字叫宝玉, 奈曼旗人.

sentences.en: He had been a naval ensign stationed off Cuba.
sentences.cn: 他是派驻古巴的海军少尉。

sentences.en: He then waved the tattered ensign above his head.
sentences.cn: 然后,他将那面支离破碎的旗子高高举过头顶挥舞起来.

sentences.en: So long as he can discern every star in its place upon that ensign.
sentences.cn: 只要他能看清那旗帜上的每一颗星.

sentences.en: The flagpole set is white, with with ensign noodles of red mutually differentiation.
sentences.cn: 旗杆套为白色, 以与旗面的红色相区别.

sentences.en: The red ensign flown directly above the blue ensign with Hong Kong armorial bearings.
sentences.cn: 在有香港徽号的英国蓝色旗之上悬挂红色的英国商船旗.

sentences.en: This rascal had the sassiest bride of any ensign in the old division.
sentences.cn: 在当时舰队里所有的海军少尉中,就数这家伙的新娘最漂亮了.

trans.tran_cn: 旗，船旗，国旗，<美>海军少尉，（表示职别等的）徽章
trans.tran_en: a flag on a ship that shows what country the ship belongs to
